transcripts.text: This is something new, the Casper Slide Part 2, featuring the Platinum Band.  And this time, we're going to get funky.  Everybody clap your hands.  Clap, clap, clap, clap your hands.  All right, now, we're going to do the basic step.  To the left.  Take it back now, y'all.  One hop this time.  Right foot, let's stomp.  Left foot, let's stomp.  Cha-cha real smooth.  To the right now.  To the left.  Take it back now, y'all.  One hop this time.  One hop this time.  Right foot, two stomps.  Left foot, two stomps.  Slide to the left.  Slide to the right.  Criss-cross.  Criss-cross.  Cha-cha, real smooth.  Let's go to work.  To the left.  Take it back now, y'all.  Five hops this time.  Right foot, lift up.  Left foot, lift up.  Freeze.  Everybody clap your hands.  Check it out, y'all.  Cha-cha now, y'all.  Cha-cha again.  Cha-cha now, y'all.  Cha-cha again.  Turn it out.  To the left.
